rooms.name: beach
rooms.description:
You find yourself at an empty beach. If you would not be stranded, this would be a nice place for holiday. 
In the sand is some debris of your broken ship.
Maybe you should talk to Carl he seems to wants to say something!

friends.name: Carl
friends.startStatement: Hey! Looks like you are stranded like me. If you bring me the right items I can help you repair your boat!

quests.name: Repairing the sail
quests.textStart: You need to search all over the island for things that could be used as a sail.
quests.textMid: You did not bring me enough parts for the sail yet.
quests.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me the parts.

fulfillmentItems.name: bedsheet
fulfillmentItems.description: A bedsheet which could be useful.

fulfillmentItems.name: sail cloth
fulfillmentItems.description: a large, torn part of the sail

fulfillmentItems.name: altar cloth
fulfillmentItems.description: A white, large piece of textile used to decorate the altar.

fulfillmentItems.name: sacks of flour
fulfillmentItems.description: Sacks of flour are leaning against the wall.

fulfillmentItems.name: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink
fulfillmentItems.description: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink
fulfillmentItems.place: is lying on the towel stand

fulfillmentItems.name: yarn and needle
fulfillmentItems.description: a thin thread for sewing and a needle

quests.name: Repairing the ship
quests.textStart: You need to search all over the island for things that could be used to repair the ship.
quests.textMid: You did not bring me enough parts yet.
quests.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me the materials.

fulfillmentItems.name: hammer
fulfillmentItems.description: A hammer with an heavy iron head and a wooden handle which can be used for forging.

fulfillmentItems.name: nails
fulfillmentItems.description: some rusty nails

fulfillmentItems.name: pile of wood
fulfillmentItems.description: A pile of wood
fulfillmentItems.place: is lying next to the old house

fulfillmentItems.name: liana
fulfillmentItems.description: A liana hanging from a tree. It seems to be as strong as a rope.

fulfillmentItems.name: rope
fulfillmentItems.description: part of the rigging is still intact and can be used as a rope

fulfillmentItems.name: anchor
fulfillmentItems.description: not to heavy but enough for a small ship

fulfillmentItems.name: ship cannon
fulfillmentItems.description: A little cannon to protect your ship and your treasures from bad people like pirates.

fulfillmentItems.name: sail
fulfillmentItems.description: a sewn sail

quests.name: Bringing equipment
quests.textStart: You need to search for equipment all over the island and give it to me. I will bring it to your boat!
quests.textMid: You did not bring me enough equipment yet.
quests.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me all equipment needed.

fulfillmentItems.name: compass
fulfillmentItems.description: a small, old compass

fulfillmentItems.name: nautical map
fulfillmentItems.description: an old, nautical map with an island marked on it

fulfillmentItems.name: life jacket
fulfillmentItems.description: a life jacket from your sunken ship

fulfillmentItems.name: telescope
fulfillmentItems.description: a golden telescope

fulfillmentItems.name: oil lamp
fulfillmentItems.description: and old oil lamp, like those used in ancient times

fulfillmentItems.name: bag of gunpowder
fulfillmentItems.description: A brown bag made out of leather with a lot of gunpowder in it.
fulfillmentItems.place: is lying in the volcanic ash on the ground

quests.name: The ancient amulet
quests.textStart: Find the ancient amulet on the island. It is worth a fortune! I will not steal it. I just bring it to your ship cabin.
quests.textMid: You did not bring me the amulet yet.
quests.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me the amulet.

fulfillmentItems.name: amulet of cassborough
fulfillmentItems.description: A precious amulet made of gold and valuable gemstones

interactiveObjects.name: waves
interactiveObjects.description: There are some great waves in the sea

tools.name: surfboard
tools.description: a red surfboard

interactiveObjects.hint: These waves look like they could be ride with a surfboard!

interactiveObjects.name: message in a bottle
interactiveObjects.description: An old bottle with a message in it

quest.name: The life of a jacket
quest.textStart: You need to search for a life jacket!

reward.name: backpack
reward.description: a backpack where you can store some additional items

fulfillmentItems.name: life jacket
fulfillmentItems.description: a life jacket from your sunken ship

interactiveObjects.hint: In the bottle is a letter, maybe you should read the letter!

ways.name: small path
ways.description: In the 'west' you can see a lagoon with some washed up boxes from your sunken ship.

ways.name: sandy way
ways.description: An entrance to a cave near the sea is on the 'east' side of the beach.
ways.hint: Maybe you can use something to surf to get to the cave

ways.name: steep track
ways.description: 'North' of the beach a steep track is leading to a hill.

cloths.name: life jacket
cloths.description: a life jacket from your sunken ship

tools.name: surfboard
tools.description: a red surfboard

tools.name: pocket lamp
tools.description: its wet but seems to work

rooms.name: cave on the beach
rooms.description:
You enter the cave which has been created by the waves crashing against the stone wall. It smells fishy in here. 
At the end of the cave you see something like a skeleton of a pirate.

ways.name: beach
ways.description: On the 'west' side you can see the beach where this nightmare started.

ways.name: tunnel
ways.description: A winding tunnel leads deeper 'down' into the cave, but it's pretty dark in there.

enemies.name: pirate skeleton
enemies.where: moving up and down the cave
enemies.startStatement: I'll kill you and break finally the curse!

foods.name: rum
foods.description: an old dusty bottle of rum
foods.place: lies next to the pirate skeleton

tools.name: telescope
tools.description: a golden telescope

weapons.name: saber
weapons.description: a rusty saber of the pirate
weapons.place: is in the belt buckle of the pirate skeleton

rooms.name: lagoon
rooms.description:
You walk along a long lagoon which protrudes into the sea. All over the place are parts of your sunken ship at the beach. 
It seems you are the only person who was washed up at this huge beach.

ways.name: small path
ways.description: A small path leads 'east' from the lagoon.

enemies.name: little komodo dragon
enemies.killStatement: The Komodo dragon lays dead in front of you!

foods.name: komodo dragon meat
foods.place: in the open body of the dragon

enemies.name: big komodo dragon
enemies.killStatement: The Komodo dragon lays dead in front of you!

foods.name: komodo dragon meat
foods.place: in the open body of the dragon

cloths.name: swimming goggles
cloths.description: swimming googles which seem to be fine

foods.name: coconut
foods.place: lies next to a palm tree

rooms.name: hill
rooms.description:
You walk through a little forest and end up in front of a little hill. You climb up the hill so you have a better overview and can orientate yourself. 
On top of the hill you can see almost over the entire island. Maybe you can get even a little higher!

interactiveObjects.name: lock
interactiveObjects.description: there is a rusty lock at the door of the hut
interactiveObjects.place: at the door of the rundown hut

tools.name: keychain
tools.description: This key looks very old ...
tools.place: lies between two wood planks on the ground

interactiveObjects.hint: Maybe you can find a key or something to unlock the lock at the door.

ways.name: steep track
ways.description: A steep track leads down in the 'south'.

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: You can climb 'up' a ladder to the treetop. Maybe you can catch a glimpse of the island?

ways.name: hillside
ways.description: In the 'north' a slope leads gently downwards to a rundown hut.

ways.name: serpentines
ways.description: A rocky winding mountain path leads down 'west' in serpentines.

foods.name: apple
foods.place: lies in the dirt next to a huge apple tree

foods.name: apple
foods.place: lies in the dirt next to a huge apple tree

foods.name: rotten apple
foods.description: this apple doesn't look that delicious
foods.place: lies in the dirt next to a huge apple tree

rooms.name: viewing platform
rooms.description:
You climb up a ladder which is placed at the apple tree. You reach the top end of the ladder and see a little viewing platform. 
On the viewing platform, you can see over the whole island. It's really huge and you can only guess what is in the distance. 
Maybe some item can help you to get a more detailed look.

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A ladder leads 'down' from the platform

tools.name: keychain
tools.description: These keys looks very old ...
tools.place: lies between two wood planks on the ground

rooms.name: rundown hut on the hill
rooms.description: You stand in front of a very old rundown hut on the hill next to the apple tree. There are no windows so you can't see what's in there and the door is locked.

ways.name: hillside
ways.description: To the 'south' of the hut is a wide slope.

enemies.name: little goblin
enemies.where: jumping up and down the hut
enemies.startStatement: What?! Who are you?! Get out of my hut!

tools.name: nails
tools.description: some rusty nails

resources.name: broken bottle
resources.description: a broken wine bottle
resources.place: stands on the table

chests.name: chest
chests.description: A chest to store things in it.
chests.place: is standing in the corner of the hut

rooms.name: cliff above the ship graveyard
rooms.description:
You can smell the sea and feel the spray on your face. You are standing on top off a cliff site with reefs in the sea and many shipwrecks in the water. 
And a big old shipwreck connecting the cliff top with the boulder and beach below.

ways.to: deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: plank
ways.description: An old plank in the 'west' is connecting the deck of the ship with the cliff.

ways.name: path
ways.description: A 'southern' beaten path leads to a small camp site.

ways.name: stream path
ways.description: 'East' a path is running alongside a stream.

roamingEnemies.name: Gregor
roamingEnemies.killStatement: You beat me. Guess you get my drink after all.

foods.name: grog
foods.description: a warm rum with sugar and water

path: deck of an old stranded ship

rooms.name: camp site
rooms.description: There is a tent, a small fire place and some trunks. The tent looks like it has been standing there for quite some time but still seems to be in use.

ways.name: path
ways.description: In the 'north' a beaten path leads to a cliff.

foods.name: lunch box
foods.description: a small box that contains some food

quests.name: treasure hunt
quests.textStart: You need to search the treasure in the sunken ship wreaks and bring it to me.
quests.textAccept: Good luck and look out for your self.
quests.textMid: You did not bring me the treasure yet!
quests.textEnd: Finally my search has an and thank you so much for help. I couldn't have done it without you.

reward.name: pirate tricorne
reward.description: an old tricorne of a pirate

fulfillmentItems.name: small treasure box
fulfillmentItems.description: a small treasure box that looks like it might contain something priceless
fulfillmentItems.place: lying in the captains cabin of a sunken pirate ship

rooms.name: deck of an old stranded ship
rooms.description:
You have boarded an old three mast sailing ship. Everything is creaking and roting. 
One mast is completely gone, one is still standing with torn, flapping sails and one is broken lying on the deck.

interactiveObjects.name: mast
interactiveObjects.description: There is a broken mast laying on top of the trapdoor into the ship interior.

weapons.name: axe
weapons.description: A sharp axe which could cut a tree.

interactiveObjects.hint: The mast could be chopped in half.

ways.from: deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: plank
ways.description: An old plank in the 'east' is connecting the deck of the ship with the cliff.

ways.from: deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: trapdoor
ways.description: A trapdoor 'down' is blocked by a fallen mast.

cloths.name: sail cloth
cloths.description: a large, torn part of the sail

resources.name: rope
resources.description: part of the rigging is still intact and can be used as a rope
resources.place: wrapped around the fallen mast

rooms.name: ship interior
rooms.description:
You are in the ships interior. You smell decaying wood and rotten fish. 
You enter a room that looks like the captains cabin. In the middle of the cabin is a table barely standing on three legs.

ways.to: deck of an old stranded ship
ways.name: trapdoor
ways.description: A trapdoor leading 'up' to the ship deck.

ways.name: hole
ways.description: On the 'south' side there's a hole in the the ship hull.

resources.name: nautical map
resources.description: an old, nautical map with an island marked on it
resources.place: on the table

resources.name: compass
resources.description: a small, old compass
resources.place: on the table

chests.name: mystery chest
chests.description: An old oak 'mystery chest' to store things in it.
chests.place: is standing by the hole in the hull

rooms.name: beach below the cliff
rooms.description:
You are at a small beach enclosed by boulders and the cliff. The sea is clear and you can see the sunken ships through the surface. 
The waves are crashing against the boulders on either side. It seems that there must be a reef before the small beach, since the waves in this area are almost non existent.

interactiveObjects.name: dolphin
interactiveObjects.description: There is a dolphin stranded on the beach only barely alive.

foods.name: fish
foods.place: is hanging on a fishing rod

interactiveObjects.hint: The dolphin can be saved by pushing him into the water and feeding him some fish.

ways.name: hole
ways.description: A short climb over the boulder leads to the hole in the ship hull in the 'north'.

ways.name: sea
ways.description: There's a short swim and dive to the sunk ship wreck in the 'west'.

ways.to: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: cave
ways.description: 'East' there's a big cave in the cliff.

tools.name: anchor
tools.description: not to heavy but enough for a small ship

rooms.name: sunken ships in the sea
rooms.description:
Close to the surface of the sea are many shipwrecks. There are many different sorts of fish swimming in the ships, which are overgrown with sea life. 
You can see a drop where the sea goes from shallow plunging in the depths. The shipwrecks are within diving range. 
You dive to the closest ship wreak.

ways.name: sea
ways.description: In the 'east' you can emerge from the depth and swim to shore.

tools.name: small treasure box
tools.description: a small treasure box that looks like it might contain something priceless

rooms.name: giant rabbit hole
rooms.description:
You stand in the middle of a gigantic hole under the earth and feel like 
Alice in Wonderland. On the walls are some roots hanging out and in the 
corner you can discover a soft bed of grass. Maybe you've landed in 
the Easter Bunny's apartment...

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'east'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'south'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: earthworm tunnel
ways.description: A little earthworm tunnel leads 'down'.

ways.name: hole in the ceiling
ways.description: A hole in the ceiling is going 'up'.

rooms.name: Hidden cave
rooms.description:
You ended up in some kind of lumber room. Apparently, people used to hide their 
secrets here and store various things. Judging by the destroyed shelves 
and all the broken glass, these treasures have already been stolen.

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'south'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'north'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: Trapdoor in the ceiling
ways.description: A trapdoor in the ceiling 'up' leads back to daylight.

resources.name: sharp sparkling shard of glass
resources.description: a sharp sparkling shard of glass

tools.name: oil lamp
tools.description: an old oil lamp, like those used in ancient times

rooms.name: Living room of a torturer
rooms.description:
A large, sparsely furnished living room, which apparently also serves as a bedroom 
and kitchen. There is only a table, covered with crumbs, with a chair and a bed 
of straw. On the floor you will find countless crushed insects in all colours and 
shapes. The shells, legs and antennae of these animals are twisted in unnatural 
positions, which they could not possibly have taken voluntarily.

ways.name: trapdoor under the carpet
ways.description: A trapdoor 'down' is hidden under the carpet.

ways.to: cellar of the old house in the forest
ways.name: hole in the wall
ways.description: On the 'east' side of the room, there is a hole in the wall.

resources.name: large beetle with a flattened carapace
resources.description: a large beetle with a flattened carapace

rooms.name: Secret Grotto
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a beautiful room that is bathed in warm colours 
by incident light. In the middle of the room is a warm pool, which with its 
steaming water calls for a relaxing bath. Next to it there are some deck chairs, 
and even a palm tree has found its way here. In the distance you can hear the 
sound of a waterfall and you wonder if this place was created by fairies.

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'west'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'east'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: stairway
ways.description: A wide gleaming marble staircase leads 'down'.

ways.name: stone way
ways.description: A stone way leads 'north'.

ways.name: wooden staircase
ways.description: A wooden staircase is leading 'up'.

resources.name: small water lily
resources.description: small water lily
resources.place: is swimming in the centre of the pool

rooms.name: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
rooms.description:
You are in a cave with ochre walls. 
As you remove the dust, you can see something that looks like paintings from the stone age. The paintings 
show different hunting scenes with huge mammoths and sabre-toothed tigers. 
You are struck by the beauty of these old paintings.
From the west you can smell the salty scent of sea water.

ways.from: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: hole in the floor
ways.description: There is a hole ('down') in the floor.  Where will the dark tunnel end?.

ways.from: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: cave
ways.description: In the 'west' you can see a little cave.

resources.name: human skull
resources.description: human skull that feels a little greasy. The shape of the skull is very different from what you are used to from the mirror and reminds you more of a monkey than a human.

rooms.name: Crossroads bat
rooms.description:
You're standing at a major underground crossroads, mysteriously 
the floor is quite warm, but never mind. 
When you look up you can understand where the name of this room comes from: The whole cave ceiling is 
covered by bats of different shapes and sizes. It looks like they are sleeping, so shhhh 
- you don't want to wake the bats.

ways.name: large brick passageway
ways.description: To the 'east' is a large brick passageway.

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'south'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'west'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase leads 'down'.

foods.name: dead bat
foods.description: don't even think of eating that uncooked 'dead bat', you'll make the whole world stay at home

rooms.name: Room under crossroads bat I
rooms.description:
You're in a rectangular chamber. It's really hot 
and sweat is dripping from your forehead. It feels like every one of your clothes is just soaked 
with sweat.  If you look to the west you can see the reason: The room is divided in two by a red-hot 
lava flow. The river is bubbling and hissing, and you have to be careful that your clothes don't 
catch fire.

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase leads 'up'.

ways.name: ladder over lava stream
ways.description: a ladder 'west' leads over the the boiling lava stream

interactiveObjects.name: lava stream
interactiveObjects.description: There is a lava stream at the west side of this room.
interactiveObjects.place: flowing at the east side of this room

tools.name: ladder
tools.description: A long ladder is standing in the corner.

interactiveObjects.hint: This hot lava stream has to be crossed with a ladder!

rooms.name: Room under crossroads bat II
rooms.description:
You're in a rectangular chamber. It's really hot 
and sweat is dripping from your forehead. It feels like every one of your clothes is just soaked 
with sweat.  If you look to the east you can see the reason: The room is divided in two by a red-hot 
lava flow. The river is bubbling and hissing, and you have to be careful that your clothes don't 
catch fire.

ways.name: heavy door
ways.description: A heavy door on the 'west' side leads to another room.

ways.name: ladder over lava stream
ways.description: A ladder leads 'east' over the the boiling lava stream

interactiveObjects.name: lava stream
interactiveObjects.description: There is a lava stream at the east side of this room.
interactiveObjects.place: flowing at the east side of this room

tools.name: ladder
tools.description: A long ladder is standing in the corner.

interactiveObjects.hint: This hot lava stream has to be crossed with a ladder!

rooms.name: Butcher's Room II
rooms.description:
You are in an enormous hall divided in two sections. The walls are tiled in red in a strange way and 
there are several drains in the floor. Strange... When you look at the walls, you'll notice 
that there are various sharp tools everywhere, from butchers knives to swords to saws. 
Scratching the walls, you'll notice that the red is not the color of the tiles, but dried 
blood...

ways.name: heavy door
ways.description: On the 'east' side is a heavy door. If the door is locked...?

ways.name: a big passage to the second half of the room
ways.description: On the 'west' there is a big passage to the second half of the room.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: a big trapdoor
ways.description: A big trapdoor, too big to miss, leads 'down'.

roamingEnemies.name: ugly big troll
roamingEnemies.where: standing in the middle of the path
roamingEnemies.situation: A stinking big dangerous looking troll is walking through the room.
roamingEnemies.startStatement: Mmm, I was already hungry. Finally the food comes along, a little lean and bony, but better than nothing.
roamingEnemies.killStatement: What a relief. Finally this miserable existence has come to an end!

tools.name: magic necklace
tools.description: a small delicate silver magic necklace, very inconspicuous and fine, but it could open ways to different people and even ways

chests.name: mystery chest
chests.description: An old oak 'mystery chest' to store things in it.

rooms.name: Butcher's Room I
rooms.description:
You are in an enormous hall divided in two sections. The walls are tiled in red in a strange way and 
there are several drains in the floor. Strange... When you look at the walls, you'll notice 
that there are various sharp tools everywhere, from butchers knives to swords to saws. 
Scratching the walls, you'll notice that the red is not the color of the tiles, but dried 
blood...

ways.name: a big passage to the second half of the room
ways.description: On the 'east' there is a big passage to the second half of the room.

ways.name: hole in the floor
ways.description: A discrete little hole 'down' in the floor leads down.
ways.hint: Take care of the little hatch!

ways.name: small door
ways.description: You see a small door on the 'north' side of the room.

ways.name: locked door
ways.description: A locked door is leading 'south'.

interactiveObjects.name: little hatch

weapons.name: axe
weapons.description: A sharp axe which could cut a tree.

interactiveObjects.hint: It looks like this hatch needs a little violence from something like an axe!

rooms.name: hidden dungeon
rooms.description:
You look into a small cell, it's cold and musty. The walls are scratched and covered with 
paintings, it looks like the last inmates in here have lost their minds. There is a small 
hole in the floor, obviously for food, and in the corner there is a bucket for the rubbish.

ways.name: discrete little hole
ways.description: To get to the top, you can take a discrete little hole in the 'upper' ceiling.

resources.name: pink fluffy unicorn
resources.description: completely starved and grey from captivity
resources.place: lying on the floor

rooms.name: cave with nothing but three ways
rooms.description: You are in a cave with nothing but three ways and a trapdoor. There is really nothing in this cave except three ways and a trapdoor.

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: a big trapdoor
ways.description: A big trapdoor, too big to miss, is in the 'upper' ceiling.

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: There is a way leading 'north'.

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: There is a way leading 'east'.

ways.from: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: There is a narrow dirty corridor leading 'south'

rooms.name: magical cave
rooms.description:
You're in a round cave. There is total silence. It's so peaceful, everything's even. 
Light from the middle of the ceiling bathes the room in a pleasant light. You imagine 
that you could stay here forever...

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: There is a way leading 'south'

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways

ways.description: There is a portal leading 'north'

ways.description: There is a portal leading 'north'

ways.description: There is a portal leading 'north'

ways.description: There is a portal leading 'north'

ways.name: Portal
ways.description: There is a portal leading 'north'

resources.name: grass
resources.description: highgrowngreengrass
resources.place: hasgrownveryhighsothatyoucannotseetheground

rooms.name: holy grotto
rooms.description:
You're in the middle of a big cave. There are stalactites hanging from the ceiling and 
the floor is littered with stalagmites. You hear the regular dripping of water from 
the top to the bottom. This is accompanied by a quiet fullfilling ommmm.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: There is a way leading 'west'

friends.name: wise hovering monk
friends.situation: A wise monk with a bald head and a long beard hovers in meditation above the ground.
friends.intro: Omm, omm. Take a seat stranger and learn from the silence.

quests.name: Every beeing deserves freedom
quests.textStart:
I have felt so heavy for some time now. I feel the vibrations of a trapped living being. 
Slowly, very slowly they are penetrating through the tunnels to me. Down here, in the 
cave system a unicorn is trapped. Please free it and bring it to me.
quests.textAccept: You perform a service to the totality of all living beings.
quests.textMid: The unicorn is still trapped. I can feel his condition getting worse.
quests.textEnd: You have proven yourself worthy. I give you my enchanted book.

reward.name: enchanted book
reward.description: an ancient enchanted book, existing since the creation of worlds

fulfillmentItems.name: pink fluffy unicorn
fulfillmentItems.description: completely starved and grey from captivity

rooms.name: mineral cave
rooms.description:
You're standing in the middle of a coal mine. A fixed oil lamp illuminates the mining area. The air is stuffy and dusty. 
At the edges you can see different heaps of rocks that have apparently been blasted out of the wall.

ways.to: cave with nothing but three ways
ways.name: way
ways.description: There is a narrow dirty corridor leading 'north'.

resources.name: piece of coal
resources.description: there is nothing special about this piece of coal
resources.place: is lying on a pile of coal pieces

rooms.name: Crossroads ape
rooms.description:
You're standing in the middle of a big crossroads. The walls are just clay and stone, 
covered with a strange pattern and you wonder why the ceiling doesn't fall on your head. 
You question whether it's only you or whether others before you have had the same thought. 
On closer inspection you notice that the patterns on the wall are primitive drawings of 
apes. Despite the age and the dirt, they are still clearly visible on closer inspection, 
impressive...

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'east'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase is going 'up'.

ways.name: magic path
ways.description: A magic path leads 'west'.
ways.hint: To use a magic way you need a special magic artifact

rooms.name: archaeological chamber
rooms.description:
You're in a chamber that for some reason has an electric 
light on. It looks like someone's been here recently. There's all kinds of archaeological equipment 
scattered around the room. The walls are full of drawings of excavated objects.

ways.to: Cave with the mortal remains of the first men
ways.name: hole in the ceiling
ways.description: Through a hole in the ceiling you can go 'up'.

ways.name: large brick passageway
ways.description: A large brick passageway leads 'west'.

rooms.name: Pillaged armory
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a looted armory. Through the flickering light of 
torches you can dimly see some stands for armour. A few individual pieces of armour 
lie scattered, broken and rusted on the floor. By looking closer you can see that 
nobody has been here for a while, the armor stands and the broken armor pieces are covered 
with a thick layer of dust.

ways.name: stone staircase
ways.description: A stone staircase is going 'down'.

ways.name: large hole in the wall
ways.description: On the 'north' side there is a big hole in the wall.

rooms.name: Earthworm tunnel
rooms.description:
A small tunnel that feels like it was dug by an oversized earthworm. 
In the absence of light, you can feel the wet, damp earth surrounding 
you in far too many places on your body. Thank God you haven't eaten 
much since you arrived at the beach, otherwise you would be stuck down 
here forever. Slowly you feel the walls coming closer and closer to you 
from all sides. Either you are claustrophobic or the walls are actually 
moving, but in both cases it's time to leave the tunnel!

ways.name: small door
ways.description: 'Southern' you can enter the room through a small door.

ways.name: little earthworm tunnel
ways.description: A little earthworm tunnel leads back 'up' to daylight.

rooms.name: Cave with underground river
rooms.description:
You're standing in a dark cave that smells like rotten fish. Your feet are wet and cold and you feel something muddy. 
It looks like you are standing in the middle of an underground river. But when you take a closer look you notice 
that it consists only of garbage, garbage and sewage. Man, it stinks!

ways.name: ladder
ways.description: A ladder leads 'up' to a cave on the beach.

ways.name: a dry way out of this cave
ways.description: In the 'north' you see a dry way out of this cave.

cloths.name: old tattered leather shoe
cloths.description: decomposed by the water and many sweaty feat

foods.name: old ampoule
foods.description: full of fermented wine, mixed with brackish water,probably undrinkable
foods.place: is lying on the ground of the river, partly covered with mud

resources.name: large gnawed rotten brown bone of an animal
resources.description: it smells so disusting that you have absolutely no desire to touch it
resources.place: is swimming on the surface of the river

tools.name: oil lamp
tools.description: and old oil lamp, like those used in ancient times

weapons.name: old rusty and bent knife
weapons.description: better suited for poisoning than stabbing
weapons.place: is lying on the ground of the river

rooms.name: Locker room
rooms.description:
You are standing in the middle of a small cave that is apparently used as a 
changing room. The floor is tiled and heated, and on the walls are small cabins for changing.

ways.name: stairway
ways.description: A wide gleaming marble staircase leads 'up'.

ways.name: a dry way
ways.description: In the 'south' a dry way leaves the locker room.

resources.name: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink
resources.description: big towel with a kind of flower pattern in blue and pink
resources.place: is lying on the towel stand

rooms.name: Killer Sauna
rooms.description:
The room is dark and hardly lit. Suddenly you feel so warm and it's so hard to 
breathe. The air is hot and stuffy, the sweat is running off your forehead. 
You slowly notice how your vision disappears and your eyes turn black. It's 
much too hot in here, even for a sauna. Get out of here!

ways.name: stone way
ways.description: A stone way leads 'south'.

ways.name: locked door
ways.description: In the 'north' you see a locked door.

rooms.name: house in the village
rooms.description: You are in a house at the village with some natives in it.

quests.name: The lost shoes
quests.textStart: Hello Stranger! I have lost my shoes somewhere in the forest. I will reward you if you bring them back to me!
quests.textMid: You did not bring me the shoes yet. Look at the forest!
quests.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me my shoes!

reward.name: some pears
reward.description: Some delicious pears. They smell really good!

rooms.name: village square
rooms.description: You are on the village square in the middle of the village. This would be a perfect spot to celebrate a party with some belly dancers and traditional music in a warm summer night

rooms.description: You are standing in front of an sacrificial altar where people can make a sacrifice for the forgiveness of their sins. This spot is above the village so you can also see the houses and the village square from here.

ways.description: A path is going downwards to the village in the 'south'.

ways.description: A narrow and very steep path going upwards to the vulcan in the 'west'. If you go up here, it can get very hot.

rooms.description: It's very hot here because you are standing on a vulcan. In front of you there is the crater with the seething lava in it, so better keep your distance. Because of the rising smoke you can't take a look down on the rest of the island.

ways.name: path
ways.description: In the 'east' a narrow and very steep path going down to the sacrificial altar. If you go down this path, it will get cooler.

rooms.name: beginning of the forest
rooms.description:
You find yourself at the beginning of a forest.
There are different noises coming from the inside. They do not sound friendly.
There is a sign leading inside the forest.

ways.name: path

rooms.name: forest path
rooms.description:
A path with trees and a small tree house.
It does not look too stable but should be barely enough to lift yourself.
To the north is a powering river.

You are in front of the old house. You can see some footsteps leading inside.
There could be a person inside the house which you can't see because of the barricaded windows. You should better watch out.

friends.name: Old John
friends.killStatement: Why did you kill an old guy like me!?

quests.name: Helping an old man
quests.textStart: Could you do me a favour and search my walking cane? It is somewhere in the village.
quests.textAccept: Thanks you for helping me out!
quests.textMid: You did not bring me my walking cane yet. It is somewhere in the village.
quests.textEnd: Thanks for bringing me my walking cane.

tools.name: bedsheet
tools.description: A bedsheet which could be useful.

weapons.name: axe
weapons.description: A sharp axe which could cut a tree.

books.name: old diary
books.description: a old diary from another stranded person
books.place: is lying on a old wooden table
pages:
Day 1
This is my first day at this island. My ship was wrecked by a stone. How should I ever get away from that island!?
I heard from a cave system. I think i should check it out.

Day 2
I found the cave system but it is very dark down there. I could not encourage myself to go in the cave. But I found a village in the distance.
I hope the native people are friendly. Its late now but I will go there tomorrow.

Day 3
Today I went to the village and had a good meal for the first time since I stranded. The native people were very friendly to me.

Day 4
This day was the worst so far! I got bit by a snake!?
Thankfully the native people could help me out. Tomorrow I will take a break from exploring and rest for a while.

Day 5
I slept a lot today and took a break as I mentioned yesterday. Not much to tell today.

Day 6
Today I feel much better. I also found a lamp which I could use in the cave.
I think that I will go there tomorrow. I hope there is no danger down there! ...

rooms.name: cellar of the old house in the forest
rooms.description:
A cellar with a torture chamber. You wonder how many people have been tortured here.
Just the thought of it will make you leave this place as soon as possible.

ways.from: cellar of the old house in the forest

ways.description: You could take the ladder 'up' to get out of the cellar.

pages:
You concluded that the treasure is hidden beneath the ruin, somehow behind stone. 

You must now find the described place.

quests.name: find findus
quests.textStart: I can't find my cat Findus. He run away and I searched him everywhere, but he disappeared.
quests.textAccept: I'm so glad you're helping me find my cat Findus.
quests.textMid: Have you found any sign of my cat yet?
quests.textEnd: Oooh Findus, I missed you so much! Thanks for your help.

rooms.name: chapel
rooms.description: It is completely quiet in the chapel. You hardly dare to breathe.

ways.name: grass path

resources.name: potted plant
resources.description: a dried up potted plant decorates the altar

books.name: staple of notes
books.description: they contain information about symbols found at the ruins
pages:
Day 1
I have studied the ancient ruins in the north. I noticed symbols. 
I have never seen inscriptions like them before. I wrote some of 
them in my notes. I am not sure if they even have a meaning or if 
they are only an elaborate decoration.

Day 2
I went again to the ruins. I noticed that many symbols are used
multiple times, some more often than others. My suspicion is that the 
symbols may have more use than being only decoration.

Day 3
I examined the symbols again. I noticed that the top line is almost 
always " ", "# #" or "###". I will check if this helps me to understand 
the symbols.

Day 5
I could find eight distinct symbols with " " at the top, ten with "# #" 
and 20 with "###". It must have a meaning, but I don't know, what that 
could be...

Day 6
There are ten diffrent digits. Could it be that symbols with "# #" 
represent numbers? If this is the case, it could be the case that " " 
are vowels and "###" consonants, But there are only five vowels, and 
I found more than five symbols starting with " "...

Day 7
I noticed that I could bring the potential number symbols in an order. 
There is a symbol with 2 filled squares, a symbol with 2 filled squares... 
and so on until a symbol with 11 squares. If we ignored the two squares 
at the top, we had the numbers from 0 to 9. I'll think that it is 
plausible to assume that these are the digits from 0 to 9:[ALFONT]0123456789[ALFONT]

Day 9
I found an old book written with the strange symbols. It is now safe 
to assume that these symbols contain valuable information. I only must 
learn how to read all of them.

Day 10
I noticed now that some symbols are similar to others, one symbol is 
even a simple mirror of an other. Maybe the letters they stand for are 
also similar. It will be still hard to decipher the messages, without 
knowing more about them.

Day 14
I started to assign randomly letters to the symbols, but found no useful 
assignment so far. There are over 100 possible assignments of five vowels 
to five symbols, and I don't know which of the possible vowel symbols 
contain vowels, and which not. For the consonants, it is even worse. 
I must think of a way to narrow down the combinations...

Day 16
I started to group together similar sounding letters and similar looking 
symbols. I also started to work on the shortest words. I won't discover 
many correct mappings at once, but every symbol mapped to a letter makes 
it more easy to decipher the rest of the text.

Day 18
I think I found the first correct mappings and am able now to decipher 
more words easier.

Day 21
I finished the mappings. I learnt that the language is very similar to 
English but some words are written in a slightly, different way.[ALFONT]abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz 0123456789 .,[ALFONT]

Day 22
I transcribed multiple texts in the ruins, but found no interesting 
information. I will now translate the book and look if there is more 
interesting information in it.

Day 23
I completed the work on the book. It contains the first verses of the Genesis, the description of the creation of the world.

books.name: bible
books.description: an old, dusty bible written with strange symbols
pages: [ALFONT]Genesis 1, 1-19[ALFONT][ALFONT]1 In the beginning God created the heavens and the earth. 2 Now the earth was formless and empty. Darkness was on the surface of the deep. God's Spirit was hovering over the surface of the waters.

[ALFONT]3 God said, "Let there be light," and there was light. 4 God saw the light, and saw that it was good. God divided the light from the darkness. 5 God called the light "day," and the darkness he called "night." There was evening and there was morning, one day.

[ALFONT]6 God said, "Let there be an expanse in the middle of the waters, and let it divide the waters from the waters." 7 God made the expanse, and divided the waters which were under the expanse from the waters which were above the expanse; and it was so. 8 God called the expanse "sky." There was evening and there was morning, a second day.

[ALFONT]9 God said, "Let the waters under the sky be gathered together to one place, and let the dry land appear;" and it was so. 10 God called the dry land "earth," and the gathering together of the waters he called "seas." God saw that it was good.

[ALFONT]11 God said, "Let the earth put forth grass, herbs yielding seed, and fruit trees bearing fruit after their kind, with its seed in it, on the earth;" and it was so. 12 The earth brought forth grass, herbs yielding seed after their kind, and trees bearing fruit, with its seed in it, after their kind; and God saw that it was good. 13 There was evening and there was morning, a third day.

[ALFONT]14 God said, "Let there be lights in the expanse of sky to divide the day from the night; and let them be for signs, and for seasons, and for days and years; 15 and let them be for lights in the expanse of sky to give light on the earth;" and it was so.

[ALFONT]16 God made the two great lights: the greater light to rule the day, and the lesser light to rule the night. He also made the stars. 17 God set them in the expanse of sky to give light to the earth, 18 and to rule over the day and over the night, and to divide the light from the darkness. God saw that it was good. 19 There was evening and there was morning, a fourth day.

rooms.description:
The spray of the waterfall splashes directly into your face, you stand directly behind the waterfall. 
It is soothing to listen to the even splashing of the waterfall and feel its energy.
